problem.markdown: 1.One of the important criteria to have oscillations in a ring oscillator is ( ) Even number of inverter stages (x) Odd number of inverter stages ( ) Does not depend on the number of inverter stages ( ) None of the above
problem.p: 1.One of the important criteria to have oscillations in a ring oscillator is

choicegroup.choice: Does not depend on the number of inverter stages
